message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GT 

This paper deals with the problem of decomposing reflectance maps into material parameters and illumination, which is a key problem in computer graphics and computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architecture, which falls under the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves re-rendering applications, which could be categorized under cs.GR (Graphics). The use of synthetic data for training the network suggests a possible fit with cs.LG (Machine Learning), and the comparison of results with previous approaches suggests a possible fit with cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
